message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,500. This is a competitive price considering the value it brings to your business.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. Given the value I place on this product, I'm willing to pay $10,500.  This price reflects the maximum I'm able to pay while still getting a good deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking to spend less, but I'm still a bit above your target. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business, and I think it's a great compromise.
